name: nICE
description:
nICE is a 3D first person puzzle adventure game where you broke into an ice cave and have to fight against the freezing temperatures while seeking for an escape with a variety of tools.

Team
Alexander Kappen | Sounddesign, Music, Leveldesign, Gamedesign (https://www.twitch.tv/kappinski)

Florian Steenblock | Programming,  Engine, Sounddesign, Gamedesign

Max Wittig | 3D Design, Leveldesign, Gamedesign (https://sketchfab.com/WittigMax)

Gameplay Video

Used applications

  • Unreal Engine 4.25
  • Blender (Modeling)
  • Autodesk Maya (Modeling)
  • Substance Painter (3D-Model Textures)
  • Rytmik Studio (Music)
  • Audacity (Sound Effect recording)
